code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import'./dashboard.css';import Cards from'../cardcomponent/Cards';import Report from'../report/Report';import RecentSels from'../sales/RecentSels';import TopSellingProduct from'../sales/TopSellingProduct';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Dashboard(){const[cards,setCards]=useState([]);const fatchData=()=>{fetch('http://localhost:4000/cards').then(res=>res.json()).then(data=>{setCards(data);}).catch(e=>console.log(e.message));};useEffect(()=>{fatchData();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{className:"dashboard section",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"row",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col-lg-8",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"row",children:[cards&&cards.length>0&&cards.map(card=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Cards,{card:card},card._id)),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col-12",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Report,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col-12",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(RecentSels,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col-12",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TopSellingProduct,{})})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col-lg-4"})]})});}export default Dashboard;
